org.odk.collect.android.instances

Interface InstancesRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseInstancesRepository

    public interface InstancesRepository
    Gives access to Instance objects representing filled form instances on the device. The goal of this layer is to separate domain objects from data fetching concerns to facilitate testing and reduce duplicated code to access those domain objects. To start, it has specific query methods. Over time, we should expand it to mediate addition and removal. If there ends up being may specific query methods, we may want to introduce a way to query more generically without introducing new specialized methods (e.g. get(Specification s) instead of getBy(XYZ).
